User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1

If I open a new browser window using Ctrl + N, after window resize, the new window arrears in 160x100 pixels.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Minimize all Firefox windows
2. Select one of them by clicking it on the toolbar or with Alt + Tab
3. Directly when it resizes to its original size, press Ctrl + N

Actual Results:  
The new window appears in 160x100 pixels size, instead of the original window-size.

Expected Results:  
Should make new window the same size, as the old one.

If you wait 1-2 seconds after resize (in step 3) and press Ctrl + N just then, then the new window will be the desired (original) size. It seems, something is setting too slowly here.
